LIDAf.20 = {
	# MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL: A Chance Encounter
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAf.20.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		desc = LIDAf.20.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = locale
			value = flag:courtyard
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 257
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 258
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 259
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_0
					value = 260
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 257
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 257
				}
			}
			# FM_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 258
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 258
				}
			}
			# MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 259
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 259
				}
			}
			# MF_ASS_TEASE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:first_transition_0 = 260
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = first_transition_1
					value = 260
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:first_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = first_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 257: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.257
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 257
				scope:first_transition_1 = 257
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 20
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 257
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.1
	}
	option = {
		# 258: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.FM_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.258
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 258
				scope:first_transition_1 = 258
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 20
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 258
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.2
	}
	option = {
		# 259: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_HANDJOB_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.259
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 259
				scope:first_transition_1 = 259
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 20
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 259
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.15
	}
	option = {
		# 260: EventsFirst.MF_MEETING_WITH_ACQUAINTANCE_INITIAL -> EventsSex.MF_ASS_TEASE
		name = LIDAoption.260
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:first_transition_0 = 260
				scope:first_transition_1 = 260
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 20
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 260
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.16
	}
	option = {
		name = cancel_meeting_option
		custom_tooltip = cancel_meeting_tooltip
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			modifier = affair_spurned_opinion
			target = scope:affairs_partner
		}
	}
}
